casebody.data:
HAIRSTON
v.
HARWARD 416A17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 2, 2018 C. Douglas Maynard, Jr., Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, James M. Roane, III, Attorney at Law, John F. Bloss, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Hairston, William (Jr.). Kent L. Hamrick, Attorney at Law, Ann C. Rowe, Attorney at Law, Winston Salem, for Harward, Ashwell Bennett (Jr.). Stephanie W. Anderson, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Erie Insurance Exchange. Ann C. Ochsner, Attorney at Law, Raleigh. Huntington M. Willis, Attorney at Law, Raleigh. Deborah J. Bowers, Attorney at Law, Greensboro. Andrew Pinto, Attorney at Law, Greensboro.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 22nd of February 2018 by Defendant (Harward):

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of March 2018."

Defendant (Harward) shall have up to and including the 13th day of April 2018 to file and serve his/ her brief with this Court.
